    • Client

      public Client() throws java.rmi.RemoteException, java.rmi.NotBoundException, java.net.MalformedURLException
      Constructor for client
      Throws:
      java.rmi.RemoteException - server connection problems
      java.rmi.NotBoundException - One of server services is not bound
      java.net.MalformedURLException - wrong url is given

  • Method Details

    • anmelden

      public void anmelden​(java.lang.String username, java.lang.String password) throws WrongPasswordException, UsernameDoesntExistException, java.rmi.NotBoundException, java.io.IOException
      Binds client to Internet and signs itself in server to recieve updates
      Parameters:
      username - to sign
      password - of username
      Throws:
      WrongPasswordException - wrong password is given
      UsernameDoesntExistException - username doesn't exist in server
      java.rmi.NotBoundException - can't find databank
      java.io.IOException - gui updating problem

      java.io.IOException - gui update error
      WrongPasswordException - wrong password given
      UsernameDoesntExistException - no such username
      java.rmi.NotBoundException - database not bound

      Parameters:
      newData - desired change in account
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException - gui update error
      UsernameDoesntExistException - username doesn't exist
      UsernameAlreadyExistException - username already exists
      java.rmi.NotBoundException - Databank not bound

    • raumErstellen

      public void raumErstellen​(java.lang.String raumName, java.lang.String password, int spielerAnzahl) throws RoomAlreadyExistException, PlayerNumberException, WrongPasswordException, UsernameDoesntExistException, java.rmi.AlreadyBoundException, java.io.IOException, java.rmi.NotBoundException
      create a vorraum
      Parameters:
      raumName - room name
      password - password
      spielerAnzahl - max player number
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException - gui update error
      java.rmi.AlreadyBoundException - similar room is already bound
      UsernameDoesntExistException - username doesn't exist
      WrongPasswordException - password is wrong
      PlayerNumberException - player number is not between 2 and 5
      RoomAlreadyExistException - room with same name exists
      java.rmi.NotBoundException - not bound
